ohloh.description: mixminion is the main implementation of the Type III ("Mixminion") remailer protocol.
ohloh.name: mixminion

description: [Mixminion](http://mixminion.net/) is a new remailer approach. The so-called type III remailer allows it to receive and send anonymous messages. However the development has stalled and the current software needs improvement.
name: Mixminion
